text: was a Japanese politician. He was the Prime Minister of Japan from 1918 to 1921. Hara was assassinated by Nakaoka Kon'ichi on 4 November 1921 after being stabbed at a Tokyo train station. ==References== Category:1856 births Category:1921 deaths Category:Assassinated Prime Ministers of Japan Category:Murders by blade weapons Category:Politicians from Iwate Prefecture
title: Hara Takashi
